roles.title: Frontend Developer
roles.description: Develop user-facing interfaces for web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.

roles.title: Backend Developer
roles.description: Build and maintain the server-side logic and databases for web applications.
skills: Web frameworks (e.g., Spring Boot, Django, Express.js)

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
roles.description: Develop both the frontend and backend components of web applications.
skills: Web frameworks (e.g., React.js, Angular, Django, Express.js)

roles.title: Mobile Developer
roles.description: Create mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms.
skills: Cross-platform development frameworks (e.g., Flutter, React Native)

roles.title: Frontend Engineer
roles.description: Specializes in the development and optimization of user interfaces for web applications.

roles.title: Backend Engineer
roles.description: Specializes in the development of server-side logic and databases for web applications.
skills: Web frameworks (e.g., Spring Boot, Django, Express.js)

roles.title: Mobile App Developer
roles.description: Specializes in creating mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications and systems.

roles.title: Data Scientist
roles.description: Analyze complex data sets to provide insights and make data-driven decisions.

roles.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
roles.description: Protect computer systems and networks from cyber threats and attacks.

roles.title: DevOps Engineer
roles.description: Facilitate collaboration between software development and IT operations teams to automate and streamline the software delivery process.

roles.title: UI/UX Designer
roles.description: Create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for software applications and websites.

roles.title: IT Support Specialist
roles.description: Provide technical assistance and support to users and organizations for hardware, software, and network issues.

roles.title: Team Lead
roles.description: Oversee and coordinate the work of a software development team, including task assignment, progress tracking, and resource management.

roles.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
roles.description: Ensure the quality and reliability of software products by designing and executing test plans, identifying defects, and providing feedback to developers.

roles.title: Systems Analyst
roles.description: Analyze business requirements and translate them into technical specifications for software development projects.
